dialog: Who's that stumbling around in the dark?
State your business or prepare to get winged!
I'm simply a fellow weary traveler.

Now, are you the Speck Brothers?
And did you purchase those men
So I wish to parley with you.
Please forgive me. It is a second language.

is a specimen I'm keen to acquire.

if you were to see any of these three gentlemen again,
Stop talking to him like that.

No sale. Now, off with you.

who can attest to that fact.

if you were to see the Brittle Brothers,

put a bullet in his head,

the North Star is that one.

didn't I give you my last apple?

get the sheriff, not the marshal.

like slavery, it's a flesh for cash business.
